title: Orc Assassin (1U262)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Minion • Orc
Strength:	6
Vitality:	2
Site:	6
Game Text:	Tracker. The roaming penalty for each [Sauron] minion you play is -1. Assignment: Spot 2 Hobbit companions to make the Free Peoples player assign a Hobbit to skirmish this minion.
Rarity:	U
Notes:	This The Fellowship of the Ring card was misprinted in the Gimli Mines of Moria starter deck. The word “non-native” should be ”roaming. “
